external_games.name: Kishi Fujii Souta no Shogi Training

name: Kishi Fujii Souta no Shogi Training
summary: Kishi Fujii Souta no Shogi Training is a shogi training game that supervised by a professional shogi player Souta Fujii. Beginners will find a lighthearted and enjoyable opportunity to learn the basics of shogi. Experience the fun and depth of shogi with Souta Fujii as your guide.
